185947624.review:
Tolle Auswahl an Fahrzeugen sowie sehr gutes FFB sowie Fahrverhalten.
Bis auf die Präsentation im Menu ist die Grafik im Game solide.
Preislich ist es Fear und man kann jedes Auto vor dem Kauf Testen.
Der Multiplayer ist zwar eher so lala aber mit Freunden sehr gut.
Auch sehr Positiv zu sehen ist das Kollisionsverhalten, es ist im vergleich zu Iracing oder ACC nicht so empfindlich und die Zweikämpfe machen so echt Fun!
Und jeder der die DTM Genial findet ,kommt an dieser Sim eh nicht vorbei!

185871903.review: Dont bother playing it if you are looking for hardcore simracing otherwise its outdated with graphics,sounds,physics and is not populated with players online.Its only good for single player and weekly leadboard chalanges.Only good thing is the price of content vs most sims but still there are sims which offer more for less and are better sims!

185871784.review:
This game is an awesome free to play racing experience... Until it isn´t. I could play basically everything for free for a week or so until suddenly, almost everything was behind a paywall. Not just one. In this game there are a hell lot of vehicle classes. Out of the box you have 7 or 8? There´s also a bunch of tracks...you have 4. This game would be such a cool alternative for people who don´t have the money for Gran Turismo or Assetto Corsa, but the fact that you have to pay for 98% of this game is ridiculous.

So. Would I recommend it? If you have a shitload of money, absolutely! If you don´t want a year`s worth of salary gone on a videogame, never!

185347294.review:
La prima volta che ho avviato il gioco era spettacolare, tutte le piste e tutte le macchine erano gratis, e l'esperienza era stata molto bella nonostante fosse un free2play (tranne qualche pacchetto premium per le macchine, ma quello ci sta, devono guadagnarci qualcosa anche loro).
Però, il problema è subentrato quando ho deciso di rinstallare il gioco, perchè trovai tutto a pagamento, tranne 4 piste e massimo 12 macchine (erano a pagamento anche quelle in tuo possesso, tranne poche auto). Per me, ora come ora, il gioco non merita più poi così tanto, ma comunque per cominciare ci può sempre stare.
Spero che possano dare una risistemata al gioco, chiederei di mettere almeno le piste gratis e qualche auto in più (e non far pagare pure quelle in tuo possesso), grazie.

185323259.review: super fun game! sucks that you have to buy some cars and tracks, but you do still get a good amount of cars and like 5 tracks. still learning the rules of the races because every time i pit, i get kicked from the race. wish some of the stuff wasnt as expensive tho, i personaly think that $5.17 dollars per race track is a little much, but you do have to charge something for a free game i soppose. over all, for a dude looking for a fun racing game, i highly recommend.

185112080.review: RaceRoom Racing Experience offers an incredibly detailed racing simulation with realistic driving physics and a variety of real-world tracks and cars. The game’s graphics and sound design are top-notch, creating an immersive experience. However, the content is heavily reliant on microtransactions, which can feel like a downside for those not willing to spend extra. For hardcore racing fans, this is a solid pick, but casual players may find the experience a bit overwhelming. :))

184669939.review:
An Excellent Game for Racing Sim Enthusiasts!

I've been playing RaceRoom Racing Experience for a while now, and I can confidently say it's one of the best racing simulators I've ever tried. The game offers an incredible variety of tracks (including my favorites like Spa, Silverstone, and Red Bull Ring), a wide range of cars, including formulas and GTs, and fantastic physics with realistic driving behavior. I'm particularly impressed by the leaderboard system, which lets you compete with players from around the world.

RaceRoom has become my ideal choice, offering all the tracks and cars I need, along with regular events and competitions.

I enjoy every moment spent behind the wheel in this game and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality racing simulator.

183873474.review: Da ich erstmal kein Geld ausgeben wollte, musste ich mich mit den kostenlosen Autos zufrieden geben, und die weekly challenge sah da eigentlich ganz lustig aus. Bin anscheinend auf der Raceroom Strecke gefahren und an sich hat das irgendwie auch Spaß gemacht, aber irgendwie und irgendwo war die Lenkhilfe an und einfach mal so stark, dass das richtig nervig war. Die Lenkhilfe war einfach stärker als das FFB! Als ich dann einfach in den Singleplayer mit einem GT Auto auf Sepang gegangen bin, konnte ich die Lenkhilfe abschwächen, da war sie aber immer noch. Und irgendwie war anscheinend auch Bremshilfe an, obwohl ich das nie angeschaltet hatte! Und FFB war sehr schwach, nutzlos und nichtssagend. Keine Ahnung wie die anderen Autos sind, hätte gerne den BMW GT3 ausprobiert, aber FFB ist enttäuschend und somit gibt es in dem Game nichts, was mich zu ihm zieht.

183518499.review: The physics felt better than Forza Motorsport has in the years following FM4. However, the game crashes after every race (probably because it wants me to pay for DLC) and the AI is so brutal that it turns Formula racing into a demolition derby. The get unlimited boost, barely take damage, and dive-bomb players at every chance. I would never recommend playing a game where the computer constantly drives on top of you at the Nurburgring.
